import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Badge } from "react-bootstrap"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Home() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const mockBooks = [ { id: 1, title: "The Great Gatsby", author: "F. Scott Fitzgerald", price: 150000, originalPrice: 200000, discount: 25, rating: 4.5, image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/7a/The_Great_Gatsby_Cover_1925_Retouched.jpg" }, { id: 2, title: "To Kill a Mockingbird", author: "Harper Lee", price: 180000, originalPrice: null, discount: null, rating: 5, image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/4f/To_Kill_a_Mockingbird_%28first_edition_cover%29.jpg" }, { id: 3, title: "1984", author: "George Orwell", price: 120000, originalPrice: 150000, discount: 20, rating: 4.8, image: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71rpa1-kyvL._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg" }, { id: 4, title: "Pride and Prejudice", author: "Jane Austen", price: 90000, originalPrice: 100000, discount: 10, rating: 4.2, image: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/71Q1tPupKjL._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg" }, ]; const renderStars = (rating) => { return ( {"★".repeat(Math.round(rating))} {"☆".repeat(5 - Math.round(rating))} ); }; return (
